job.title: Data Engineer- Machine Learning
job.description: <strong><u>Job Description<br></u></strong><ul><li>Should have very strong experience with 10+ Years .</li><li>Hands on Python experience in designing, developing microservices, REST APIs.</li><li>Solid hands on experience developing Python applications using libraries, IBM accelerators on Data Sciences/Client projects.</li><li>Experience using Python such as Flask, Django, etc.</li><li>Experience using microservices orchestration using frameworks such as AirFlow, etc."</li></ul>
